path: PDF Library/Graphic Maintenance Quick Reference/Viz One/Media Encoder, QTStills.docx
text: Supported by Production Creative - x44670 The media encoder is a drop folder that converts still images to looping clips for use in Viz One. Drop folder location is: \\100.113.81.248\qtstills This process runs on a Mac tower located on the bottom of 580S-4, ER-11. Log in with Name:render Password:render Adobe Media Encoder CC 2014 should be running, and the watchfolder set to /Users/render/Desktop/QTSTILLS and the output folder of /Volumes/import/smbimp1 The output folder must be accessible via Finder for this to function.
